1J7.SI.summary: Jawala Inc., a forest resource company, focuses on industrial tree plantations located in Sabah. The company engages in the management of forestry resources, and the planting and extraction of timber, as well as cultivation of industrial tree plantations. It is also involved in the harvesting, processing, distribution, and sale of timber. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Kota Kinabalu, Malaysia.
